Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
20.08.2014 SH SCR19088 Added BSF201-75 (handle stock files --> Creditors)
23.07.2014 SH SCR19009 Added BSF201-70 (handle stock files)
12.03.2014 SH SCR18686 BSF200-10 Added update NFIR_ADMNO/CLNTNO with extracted admin/client number from filename
14.02.2014 SH SCR18677 Added preparation of v.STARTDATE/v.STARTTIME, used as parameter to call BSP203-20
01.08.2013 SH SCR17603 Removed BDC200DD (was used for BSP201-90 debtor handling) and removed BSP201-80 handling
15.07.2013 SH SCR18260 File validation: Extended program to enable proper handling if leading/trailing double quotes exists per
column; Extended BSP201-90 file validation in task
30.10.2012 SH SCR17603 Restored backup
25.09.2012 SH SCR17577 Added call of UFB597-AccessDummyFile between the file validation and the
BSP201-xx programs to import the file as workaround
18.05.2011 SH SCR16468 Added PI.OVERRIDE_ADMNO (handling will follow soon)
16.03.2011 SH SCR16285 Switch SysLanguage to ICSE language for message
"Unknown file format"
06.11.2010 SH SCR15370 Changed test to skip empty rows from file into lenght of
of row <= 1 (avoid problems with Hex 00 at the end of the files)
06.07.2010 SH SCR15635 Disabled test on valid names for BSP201-50 in case the
files are uploaded via creditview
27.05.2010 SH SCR15370 Extended program to support all kind of debtor file
formats (DD, ND, OD --> regarding the record type in the fle)
28.04.2010 SH SCR15481 Added BSP201-100 (ODC200 file format)
11.11.2008 AK SCR14096 fixed wrong error mressage text ('Unknown file format')
13.08.2008 SH SCR13637 Fixed problem check DD files
21.05.2008 SH SCR13637 Added BSP201-80 ('DD' debtor file handling)
13.05.2008 SH SCR13604 Added PO.REALDEBTORFILE (see BSP201-30) and
25.02.2008 SH SCR13416 Changed submit BSP210 into normal call (synchron); Added
test in part 'Rename files' to skip moving to /handled in case of errors are
12.02.2008 SH SCR13380 Added PI.HANDLEINSOURCEDIR, uses to skip part "Rename
17.01.2008 SH SCR13291 Added GB560 to adjust system date/time acc. to timezones,
necessary for website handling
10.01.2008 SH SCR13260 Added BSP201-90 (debtor file handling)
19.11.2007 SH SCR13092 Moved calls of BSP203_20 and BSP210 to end of
transaction, to avoid locks on JOBL
23.10.2007 SH SCR12985 Removed GSET_YESNO(8001)='Y' to call dev version of
12.10.2007 SH SCR12985 Added GSET_YESNO(8001)='Y' to call dev version of
BSP201-20, else current version is called
-- Extracted filename from v.PI.PATHFILENAME
-- Preparations
-- Convert input parameters to proper FL pictures
-- Extract filename from v.PI.PATHFILENAME, uses e.g. as argument in
BSP203-20 to start BSP150
... if called from website we store local date / time of country and not the
system date / time
... always store a row to NFIR (NEW_FILE_INVOICE_RUN)
... validate the file (test the file type)
--25.09.2012 SH Workaround to solve problem when file is read again after the file validation
in the BSP201 submodules to test/import the file
-- Call modules to handel the different client file formats
-- Invoice files
... old file format
... new file format
... file format (NL)
... old file format (NL)
... reverse factoring file format
... validate the filename and only in case of valid file name start BSP201-50
-- Stock file
-- Stock file (75) --> Creditors
-- Debtor files
... 'DD' debtor file format (record type = 'DD')
... 'ND' debtor file format (record type = 'ND')
... new debtor file format
... ODC200 debtor file format
-- Errors detected in validations
-- Website handling (not if errors are detected)
-- Rename files
... not if uploaded via website
... not if file has to be validated only (BSP200 is called from OSP009)
... not if it's an old DD/ND debtor file (see BSP201-82/84) and no errors are detected
then BSP106 is already called, to handle this file, in this case v.RenameFiles = FALSE
-- Further file handling in case of no errors
-- Finally delete all NEW_FILE_INVOICE rows (only if a valid file format is
detected and not if BSP203_20 is called or BSP210 is submitted, because
program select/delete the NFIN rows)
-- Files with all invoices (Intercredit / Confidential)
... do not handle new invoice for confidential clients
-- Set NFRI_ADMNO/NFIR_CLNTNO (fetch form filename)
-- Delimiter can be a dash (-) or an underscrore (_)
... delimeter = dash
... delimeter = underscore
First check if debtor files have to be handled
.. if BSP200 is not called from creditview, check first for DD/ND/90 formatted
debtor files, which were split before by BSP104
... an ODC200 debtor file format has to be handled
-- For all other files, the first two rows from the file have to be tested to
determine the file type

ExpSyntax.val: NOT ({4,8}) AND NOT ({4,9}) AND NOT ({4,10}) AND (InStr (Trim ({1,16}),'dcln')>0 OR InStr (Trim ({1,16}),'DCLN')>0)
NOT ({4,8}) AND NOT ({4,9}) AND NOT ({4,10}) AND NOT ({4,11})

Text.val: -- Check file format
... dutch debtor file format
... old dutch debtor file format
... new dutch debtor file format
-- Read first 2 lines from invoice file, to check the file type
... empty lines can be ignored
.. remove possible first double quote, delivered sometimes in case of CSV files
-- Check file format
... old file format --> call BSP201-10
... new file format --> call BSP201-20
... dutch file format --> call BSP201-30 (also if file is uploaded via
website and type = DD, because the file contain probably a mix of FF/DD rows)
... old dutch file format --> call BSP201-40 (also if file is uploaded via
website and type = ND, because the file contain probably a mix of
NF/ND rows)
... reverse factoring file format --> call BSP201-50
... stock file --> cal BSP201-70
... stock file --> cal BSP201-75
... debtor file format --> call BSP201-90
.. if OF/OD/CD/ID these are old formatted client files and have not be
handled, in this case the file has to be renamed
... if pos. 1-2 or row 1 and 2 are not recognized then write row in table NFER
and go to Errors detected in validation
-- Read first 2 lines from invoice file, to check the file type
... empty lines can be ignored
.. remove possible first double quote, delivered sometimes in case of CSV files

ExpSyntax.val: Left (Trim ({0,2}),3)='REC' OR Left (Trim ({0,2}),3)='GUT' OR Left (Trim ({0,2}),3)='END' OR Left (Trim ({0,3}),3)='REC' OR Left (Trim ({0,3}),3)='GUT' OR Left (Trim ({0,3}),3)='END'
Left (Trim ({0,2}),2)='FF' OR Left (Trim ({0,3}),2)='FF' OR (Left (Trim ({0,2}),2)='DD' OR Left (Trim ({0,3}),2)='DD') AND {1,11}>0
Left (Trim ({0,2}),2)='NF' OR Left (Trim ({0,3}),2)='NF' OR (Left (Trim ({0,2}),2)='ND' OR Left (Trim ({0,3}),2)='ND') AND {1,11}>0

Left (Trim ({0,2}),2)='OF' OR Left (Trim ({0,2}),2)='OD' OR Left (Trim ({0,2}),2)='CD' OR Left (Trim ({0,2}),2)='ID' OR Left (Trim ({0,3}),2)='OF' OR Left (Trim ({0,3}),2)='OD' OR Left (Trim ({0,3}),2)='CD' OR Left (Trim ({0,3}),2)='ID'

... fetch main directory
... error while fetching directory via UFB533

... fetch main directory

-- Move invoice file to directory ...\ERROR
... fetch main directory
... error while fetching directory via UFB533
-- If directory exist start procedure to move current invoice file
... Rename current file
... extend main directory with date stamp
... create directory if does not exist
.. copy invoice file
... and finally delete the current handled file if copy was successful
